subtitle: Bridging the healthcare gap between urban and rural areas through online consultation and digital records.
patient_services_desc: Book appointments, view medical history, lab reports, and prescriptions.
doctor_tools_desc: Manage appointments, access patient history, give e-prescriptions, and calculate commissions.
admin_control_desc: Handle user profiles, system reports, grievances and feedback management.
why_system_desc: Many rural and remote areas lack access to professional healthcare and proper record-keeping. Our goal is to bring essential medical services to every corner using the power of the internet ‚Äî whether at home or through community kiosks.
help_manual_content: Welcome to eHealthConnect. This guide will help you understand how to use the platform as a patient, doctor, or administrator.
patient_steps: Register or log in using your mobile number.
Access your medical history, prescriptions, and lab results.
Join consultations via video or messaging.
doctor_steps: Log in securely as a doctor.
admin_steps: Manage user profiles for patients and doctors.
Access usage statistics and system reports.
Handle feedback and technical issues reported by users.
support_text: If you face issues, please contact our support team:
contact_us_intro: Have a question or need help? We're here to support you.
